alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oak Hill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Titusville, New Smyrna Beach, Edgewater, Oak Hill and Mims. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida.
